statusEffect.name: add_ferals
statusEffect.applyEffect:
[##var PenisLength = npc.getPenisRawSizeValue()] [##var Depth0 = npc.getHeightValue()-npc.getHeightValue()*0.995] [##var Depth1 = npc.getHeightValue()-npc.getHeightValue()*0.9925] [##var Depth2 = npc.getHeightValue()-npc.getHeightValue()*0.9] [##var Depth3 = npc.getHeightValue()-npc.getHeightValue()*0.85] [##var Depth4 = npc.getHeightValue()-npc.getHeightValue()*0.8] [##var Depth5 = npc.getHeightValue()-npc.getHeightValue()*0.75] [##var Depth6 = npc.getHeightValue()-npc.getHeightValue()*0.7] [##var Depth7 = npc.getHeightValue()-npc.getHeightValue()*0.6]
[##var D0 = (PenisLength>Depth0) ? 1 : 0] [##var D1 = (PenisLength>Depth1) ? 1 : 0] [##var D2 = (PenisLength>Depth2) ? 1 : 0] [##var D3 = (PenisLength>Depth3) ? 1 : 0] [##var D4 = (PenisLength>Depth4) ? 1 : 0] [##var D5 = (PenisLength>Depth5) ? 1 : 0] [##var D6 = (PenisLength>Depth6) ? 1 : 0] [##var D7 = (PenisLength>Depth7) ? 1 : 0] [##var SumDepth = D0+D1+D2+D3+D4+D5+D6+D7]
[##var R = 72000]
#IF(RND.nextInt(100)<=30) [##npc.setFeral(npc.getSubspecies())] [##npc.setFeral(npc.getSubspecies())] #IF(npc.isFeral()==true) [##function putInInventory(x) {npc.getInventory().addClothing(x);}] [##npc.unequipAllClothing(npc,true,true).values().forEach(putInInventory)] #IF(npc.hasPenis()==null) [##npc.setPenisType(npc.getRace().getRacialBody().getPenisType())] [##npc.setPenisSize(npc.getHeightValue()/5)] #IF(npc.getHeightValue()<=50) [##npc.setPenisCumStorage(npc.getHeightValue()*2)] [##npc.setPenisCumProductionRegeneration(RND.nextInt((R*2)+(R/2))/2)] [##npc.setPenisGirth(3)] #ELSEIF(npc.getHeightValue()<=100) [##npc.setPenisCumStorage(npc.getHeightValue()*2)] [##npc.setPenisCumProductionRegeneration(RND.nextInt((R*3)+(R*2))/2)] [##npc.setPenisGirth(2)] #ELSEIF(npc.getHeightValue()<=150) [##npc.setPenisCumStorage(npc.getHeightValue()*2)] [##npc.setPenisCumProductionRegeneration(RND.nextInt((R*3)+(R*2))/1.5)] [##npc.setPenisGirth(2)] #ELSEIF(npc.getHeightValue()<=200) [##npc.setPenisCumStorage(npc.getHeightValue()*2)] [##npc.setPenisCumProductionRegeneration(RND.nextInt((R*8)+(R*4))/2)] [##npc.setPenisGirth(2)] #ELSEIF(npc.getHeightValue()<=250) [##npc.setPenisCumStorage(npc.getHeightValue()*2)] [##npc.setPenisCumProductionRegeneration(RND.nextInt((R*12)+(R*6))/2.5)] [##npc.setPenisGirth(2)] #ELSEIF(npc.getHeightValue()<=300) [##npc.setPenisCumStorage(npc.getHeightValue()*(RND.nextInt(12)+3))] [##npc.setPenisCumProductionRegeneration(RND.nextInt((R*100)+(R*20))/3)] [##npc.setPenisGirth(2)] #ELSEIF(npc.getHeightValue()<=350 || npc.getHeightValue()>=350) [##npc.setPenisCumStorage(npc.getHeightValue()*(RND.nextInt(25)+3))] [##npc.setPenisCumProductionRegeneration(RND.nextInt((R*180)+(R*20))/3.5)] [##npc.setPenisGirth(2)] #ENDIF [##npc.setVaginaDepth([SumDepth.toFixed(0)])] [##npc.setAssDepth([SumDepth.toFixed(0)])] [##npc.setFaceDepth([SumDepth.toFixed(0)])]
[##npc.setVaginaCapacity(npc.getPenisDiameter(), true)] [##npc.setAssCapacity(npc.getPenisDiameter(), true)] [##npc.setFaceCapacity(npc.getPenisDiameter(), true)]
[##npc.setPenisCumExpulsion(100)] [##npc.setPenisStoredCum(npc.getPenisRawCumStorageValue())] [##npc.setPenisType(PENIS_TYPE_NONE)] #ENDIF #IF(npc.hasVagina()==null) [##npc.setVaginaType(npc.getRace().getRacialBody().getVaginaType())] [##npc.setPenisSize(npc.getHeightValue()/5)]
[##npc.setVaginaDepth([SumDepth.toFixed(0)])] [##npc.setAssDepth([SumDepth.toFixed(0)])] [##npc.setFaceDepth([SumDepth.toFixed(0)])]
[##npc.setVaginaCapacity(npc.getPenisDiameter(), true)] [##npc.setAssCapacity(npc.getPenisDiameter(), true)] [##npc.setFaceCapacity(npc.getPenisDiameter(), true)]
[##npc.setPenisCumStorage(npc.getHeightValue()*SumCumStorage)] [##npc.setPenisCumProductionRegeneration(144000*SumCumStorage)] [##npc.setPenisCumExpulsion(100)] [##npc.setPenisStoredCum(npc.getPenisRawCumStorageValue())] [##npc.setVaginaType(VAGINA_TYPE_NONE)] #ENDIF [##npc.setPenisSize(npc.getHeightValue()/5)] #IF(npc.getHeightValue()<=50) [##npc.setPenisCumStorage(npc.getHeightValue()*2)] [##npc.setPenisCumProductionRegeneration(RND.nextInt((R*2)+(R/2))/2)] [##npc.setPenisGirth(3)] #ELSEIF(npc.getHeightValue()<=100) [##npc.setPenisCumStorage(npc.getHeightValue()*2)] [##npc.setPenisCumProductionRegeneration(RND.nextInt((R*3)+(R*2))/2)] [##npc.setPenisGirth(2)] #ELSEIF(npc.getHeightValue()<=150) [##npc.setPenisCumStorage(npc.getHeightValue()*2)] [##npc.setPenisCumProductionRegeneration(RND.nextInt((R*3)+(R*2))/1.5)] [##npc.setPenisGirth(2)] #ELSEIF(npc.getHeightValue()<=200) [##npc.setPenisCumStorage(npc.getHeightValue()*2)] [##npc.setPenisCumProductionRegeneration(RND.nextInt((R*8)+(R*4))/2)] [##npc.setPenisGirth(2)] #ELSEIF(npc.getHeightValue()<=250) [##npc.setPenisCumStorage(npc.getHeightValue()*2)] [##npc.setPenisCumProductionRegeneration(RND.nextInt((R*12)+(R*6))/2.5)] [##npc.setPenisGirth(2)] #ELSEIF(npc.getHeightValue()<=300) [##npc.setPenisCumStorage(npc.getHeightValue()*(RND.nextInt(12)+3))] [##npc.setPenisCumProductionRegeneration(RND.nextInt((R*100)+(R*20))/3)] [##npc.setPenisGirth(2)] #ELSEIF(npc.getHeightValue()<=350 || npc.getHeightValue()>=350) [##npc.setPenisCumStorage(npc.getHeightValue()*(RND.nextInt(25)+3))] [##npc.setPenisCumProductionRegeneration(RND.nextInt((R*180)+(R*20))/3.5)] [##npc.setPenisGirth(2)] #ENDIF [##npc.setVaginaDepth([SumDepth.toFixed(0)])] [##npc.setAssDepth([SumDepth.toFixed(0)])] [##npc.setFaceDepth([SumDepth.toFixed(0)])]
[##npc.setVaginaCapacity(npc.getPenisDiameter(), true)] [##npc.setAssCapacity(npc.getPenisDiameter(), true)] [##npc.setFaceCapacity(npc.getPenisDiameter(), true)]
[##npc.setPenisCumExpulsion(100)] [##npc.setPenisStoredCum(npc.getPenisRawCumStorageValue())] #ENDIF #ENDIF [##npc.getAffectionMap().put("all_feral",1)]
